Kirsty Goodary

Hello, welcome to my portfolio!

About Me

After working in the legal industry for 8 years, I am looking for a new challenge and I have been training to be a junior full stack developer at Northcoders.
I am very hardworking and results driven. I take pride in exceeding my objectives. In my previous roles, I consistently exceeded my targets. These roles also required me to follow fast paced processes, meet deadlines and problem solve. I work very well in a team, I also work equally as well on my own.
I also am a member of Code and Stuff, a meetup group for women and non- binary persons.
I won my first Legaltech hackathon in March 2020. The product is now the development phase, with the support from Barclays Eagle Labs and the Law Society. A download link to my CV can be found here.

The Good News Inc

Fullstack news board. RESTful API built with Node.js, Express.js, PostgresSQL and Knex. Front end built with React.js and CSS.

Hosted Version

PollCat app

Welcome to PollCat! PollCat is a voting app, designed to analyze data for geographical regions by taking the users geolocation. The project was completed during the project phase at Northcoders bootcamp. The project involved working in a team of 4, practicing AGILE development, daily stand ups, and using a Kanban board before we presented the project on graduation day. RESTful API built with Node.js, Express.js, PostgresSQL, Knex and AWS. Front end built with React Native and Firebase. The graduation showcase video can be found here.

Alexa Skill Repository

Content aggregation API (in development)

I am presently designing a RESTful API for Pillar Project, which is going to be a content aggregation API for their social media.
The API can then be used by other platforms.
